Command *rmpath*
*****************

Documentation for the rmpath command in */trans/cmds/rmpath.c*.

Command
=======

See: `Command:  <addpath.html>`_ `Command:  <printpath.html>`_ 

USAGE: ``rmpath <directory>``

This command will remove a path from your current exec paths.
